name: nattily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone, usually a man, is nattily dressed, they look stylish and tidy: The men are nattily dressed in slacks and sport coats. He was dressed nattily in a pinstripe suit. See
natty
More examplesFewer examplesHe appeared clad nattily in a tweed jacket and a kilt.Rather nattily for an accountant, he is dressed in a blue striped shirt, red tie, and a navy pullover.He was nattily turned out in a gray suit, black hat, and freshly polished black shoes.
